articles.title: Finolex Industries posts consolidated profit at Rs 97.96 crore for July-September quarter - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company had posted a loss of Rs 95.38 crores during the corresponding quarter of the previous financial year, Finolex Industries said in a regulatory filing.
